heading: About Us
paragraph: Nouvo Ayiti 2075 is a movement dedicated to restoring dignity, rebuilding hope, and renewing vision for Haiti.
teamIntro: We are a collective of passionate leaders, volunteers, and community members working together to build a brighter future.
metaDescription: Discover Nouvo Ayiti 2075. Learn about our mission, team, and vision for restoring dignity and rebuilding hope in Haiti.
